name: hxPiPhidgetInterfaceKit
description: hxPiPhidgetInterfaceKit is an openfl extension that allows access to the Phidgets InterfaceKit boards like the 8/8/8 and enables reading analog sensor input and digital in/output
releasenote: Requires libphidget-2.1.8.20150410 and libusb-dev to be installed. For root-less access copy udev rule from folder dependencies
